attributes.action: ensure that MPs pay capital gains tax on the sale of homes that are not designated as their primary residence - e.g. their constituency home if they declare their London residence to be their primary residence. Furthermore, they should not be able both to claim expenses for such homes and also offset these expenses against such tax.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We have heard much about MPs claiming expenses for second homes, and also declaring London residences to be their primary residence. In such a case they should be required to pay capital gains tax on the sale of any other property including their constituency home.
